Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Victoria's at Ewingsdale Byron Bay in Ewingsdale, you'll be near the beach and within the vicinity of Byron Bay Golf Course and Tyagarah Nature Reserve. This 5-star guesthouse is within the vicinity of Tallow Beach and Kings Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 5 air-conditioned guestrooms.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with onsite massages or enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool. Additional amenities include wedding services, a fireplace in the lobby, and barbecue grills.

Dining
Breakfast is available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
This guesthouse has 2 meeting rooms available for events. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2:30 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
Breakfast is available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Pamper yourself with onsite massages or enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool. Additional amenities include wedding services, a fireplace in the lobby, and barbecue grills.
Make yourself at home in one of the 5 air-conditioned guestrooms.

When you stay at Victoria's at Ewingsdale Byron Bay in Ewingsdale, you'll be near the beach and within the vicinity of Byron Bay Golf Course and Tyagarah Nature Reserve. This 5-star guesthouse is within the vicinity of Tallow Beach and Kings Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Byron Bay Golf Course - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Tyagarah Nature Reserve - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Tallow Beach - 6.2 km / 3.8 mi
Kings Beach - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi
Wategos Beach - 7.3 km / 4.5 mi
Cape Byron Lighthouse - 7.5 km / 4.6 mi
Lake Ainsworth Sport and Recreation Centre - 14.5 km / 9 mi
Lennox Head Surf Life Saving Club - 15 km / 9.3 mi
Ballina Jockey Club - 22 km / 13.7 mi
Ballina Golf Club - 22.3 km / 13.9 mi
Ballina Fair Shopping Centre - 22.8 km / 14.2 mi
Shelly Beach - 23.5 km / 14.6 mi
Lighthouse Beach - 24.2 km / 15 mi
Ballina Naval and Maritime Museum - 24.4 km / 15.2 mi

The preferred airport for Victoria's at Ewingsdale Byron Bay is Ballina, NSW (BNK-Ballina - Byron Gateway) - 20.4 km / 12.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
